fn.p: Contributors: CE, SO, EO-E, SG, MR and MG designed the study and drafted the protocol. OE, PA, GE, TFO, CW, FS, TK, SW, FK, SD, LO and MP wrote and reviewed the study protocol and will be involved in patient care, sample processing or data analysis during the study.
Funding: This research is funded as part of the Global Health Protection Programme (GHPP) of the German Federal Ministry of Health, project ZMVI1-2519GHP704.
Patient and public involvement: Patients and/or the public were not involved in the design, conduct, reporting or dissemination plans of this research.
Patient consent for publication: Not required.
Provenance and peer review: Not commissioned; externally peer reviewed.
